pull.title: refactor: Add BlockManager getters
pull.body: Requested in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25781#discussion_r1061323795, but adding getters seems unrelated from removing globals, so I split it out for now.

### Conflicts

comments.body: Nice refactoring.  It looks like there is also a minor user-facing behavior change here, but at first glance only affecting RPC getblockfrompeer and probably not an issue.
